channel.title: Vengeance Crashes Client
channel.description: Well, basicly if someone tries using vengeance(not giving to another player that works fine) then then the players client will crash/freeze. I tried searching for Vengeance in client class but only found Give Venge. Any ideas?

item.title: Vengeance Crashes Client

@runescapepkserver wrote:

Well, basicly if someone tries using vengeance(not giving to another player that works fine) then then the players client will crash/freeze. I tried searching for Vengeance in client class but only found Give Venge. Any ideas?
